item.title: Experience the hallyu wave with Viator tours
item.description:
Viator, a popular tour booking platform, has noticed a surge in demand for tours featuring filming locations from the hit Korean drama “Descendants of the Sun.”
Besides tours to Greece, Viator offers the “Yongin MBC Dramia TV Set Tour” in Korea. This half-day tour takes fans behind the scenes at Yongin MBC TV studios, showcasing sets used in Korea’s most popular historical dramas.
For K-drama music enthusiasts, Viator has curated the “K Pop Tour” in Seoul...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/experience-the-hallyu-wave-with-viator-tours/

item.title: Song Seung Heon is in Singapore to promote Saimdang
item.description:
Source: Singtel. Korean celebrity Song Seung Heon spent time with fans and Singtel TV subscribers during a Singapore trip sponsored by Singtel and Oh!K. Two hundred Singtel TV subscribers in Singapore enjoyed an exclusive meeting with Korean actor Song Seung Heon, hosted by Singtel and Oh!K. Song’s visit was to promote his K-drama Saimdang (师任堂). Before a large public event at The Cathay, Singtel TV subscribers could take pictures with Song and chat with him...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/song-seung-heon-is-in-singapore-to-promote-saimdang/

item.title: Fans in Singapore of Song Seung Heon may have the opportunity to meet him
item.description:
Source: Singtel. Poster for Saimdang featuring Song. To kick off the new year, Singtel is bringing South Korean celebrity Song Seung Heon to Singapore on January 7, 2017. Song’s visit will promote the drama Saimdang (师任堂), which premieres on Singtel TV’s Oh!K channel (channel 525/611) on January 25, 2017, at 9 pm. Singtel TV subscribers can enter to win 20 pairs of tickets to a meet-and-greet and autograph session with Song...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/fans-in-singapore-of-song-seung-heon-may-have-the-opportunity-to-meet-him/

item.title: The domain name "Dot World" is now in the sunrise period for Chinese, Japanese, and Korean languages
item.description:
Stable Tone’s DotWorld_IDN Registry has started the sunrise period for its Chinese, Japanese, and Korean top-level domain (TLD). This period, ending on November 10, 2015, allows trademark holders with prior rights to register DotWorld_IDN domain names before the public launch. Starting November 17, 2015, anyone can register these domains on a first-come, first-served basis. The two-character domain extension, 世界, translates to “world” in all three languages (pronounced “shijie” in Chinese, “seikai” in Japanese, and “segye” in Korean)...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/the-domain-name-dot-world-is-now-in-the-sunrise-period-for-chinese-japanese-and-korean-languages/
